ctx: intros Q a b p q Hreduce Heq Hcanonical.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Heq : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) b0 : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b0 q0 : list (Term A n) H : inPolySet (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b0 q0) Q H0 : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b0 H1 : eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b0 nZb p q0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Unable to unify "divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b0" with "reduce Q p q".

original: intros Q a b p q Hreduce Heq Hcanonical. inversion_clear Hreduce. subst. apply H0.
